title: Flock and Moreno (Moreno Valley Police Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Hello, 

I am seeking records related to Flock Cameras and your office:

Communications: 
@flocksafety.com 
anyone representing the company Flock safety (public relations or lobbyists)

Names of people communicating about Flock Safety
Hector
Josh Thomas

Produce all emails, attachments, and full email threads

Do not include marketing emails or emails from hello@flocksafety.com

Text messages related to Flock Safety on the phones of the heads of the applicable department. (Chief, Deputy Chief, Mayor, Staff for Mayor)

Copies of receipts/itemized documentation of any gifts, meals, travel, tickets to events

January 2023 to November 2024

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Joey Scott
